summary: Craft Archmage\'s Robes, Nightingale, Thalmor, Psiijic, Morokei, etc. in many variants including with and without enchantments.
descriptionHtml:
DESCRIPTION
===========
The purpose is to make it easy for aspiring Arch-Mage to customize their appearance by adding crafting recipes to the Blacksmith Forge.  Spread across two different ESP files these recipes include enchanted variants of items such as the Archmage\'s Robes and Morokei as well as unenchanted robes, hoods, boots and gloves in various styles including Thalmor, Psiijic, Nightingale and many more.  All items are relatively easy to craft but still require enough ingredients to be balanced and not alter the progression of Smithing or provide any kind of monetary return not attainable in the normal game.

ENCHANTED CLOTHING
==================
Archmage\'s Robes Enchantment (+15% All Spells, +50 Magicka, +100% Magicka Regen)
* Original Style
 with hood: 9 Leather Strips, 6 Leather, 2 Grand Soul Gem, 5 Greater Soul Gem
 without hood: 3 Leather Strips, 4 Leather, 2 Grand Soul Gem, 5 Greater Soul Gem

* Psiijic Style
 with hood: 9 Leather Strips, 6 Leather, 2 Grand Soul Gem, 5 Greater Soul Gem
 without hood: 3 Leather Strips, 4 Leather, 2 Grand Soul Gem, 5 Greater Soul Gem

* Thalmor Style
 with hood: 9 Leather Strips, 6 Leather, 2 Grand Soul Gem, 5 Greater Soul Gem
 without hood: 3 Leather Strips, 4 Leather, 2 Grand Soul Gem, 5 Greater Soul Gem

* Nightingale Style
 with hood: 9 Leather Strips, 6 Leather, 2 Grand Soul Gem, 5 Greater Soul Gem
 without hood: 3 Leather Strips, 4 Leather, 2 Grand Soul Gem, 5 Greater Soul Gem

* Shrouded Style (Dark Brotherhood Robes)
 with hood: 9 Leather Strips, 6 Leather, 2 Grand Soul Gem, 5 Greater Soul Gem
 without hood: 3 Leather Strips, 4 Leather, 2 Grand Soul Gem, 5 Greater Soul Gem
 
Morokei Enchantment (+100% Magicka Regen)
* All circlet variations: 1 Gold Ingot, 1 Grand Soul Gem

UNENCHANTED CLOTHING
====================
* Wild Robes (unenchanted original Archmage\'s Robes)
 with hood: 9 Leather Strips, 6 Leather
 without hood: 3 Leather Strips, 4 Leather

* Shrouded Robes (Dark Brotherhood Robes)
 with hood: 9 Leather Strips, 6 Leather
 without hood: 3 Leather Strips, 4 Leather

* Shrouded Hood
 1 Leather Strips, 2 Leather

* Shrouded Gloves
 2 Leather Strips, 2 Leather

* Shrouded Boots
 2 Leather Strips, 1 Leather

* Psiijic Robes
 with hood: 9 Leather Strips, 6 Leather
 without hood: 3 Leather Strips, 4 Leather

* Psiijic Hood
 1 Leather Strips, 2 Leather

* Psiijic Gloves
 2 Leather Strips, 2 Leather

* Psiijic Boots
 2 Leather Strips, 1 Leather

* Thalmor Robes
 with hood: 9 Leather Strips, 6 Leather
 without hood: 3 Leather Strips, 4 Leather

* Thalmor Hood
 1 Leather Strips, 2 Leather

* Thalmor Gloves
 2 Leather Strips, 2 Leather

* Thalmor Boots
 2 Leather Strips, 1 Leather

* Nightingale Robes
 with hood: 9 Leather Strips, 6 Leather
 without hood: 3 Leather Strips, 4 Leather

* Nightingale Hood
 1 Leather Strips, 2 Leather

* Nightingale Gloves
 2 Leather Strips, 2 Leather

* Nightingale Boots
 2 Leather Strips, 1 Leather

* Focusing Gloves
 2 Leather Strips, 2 Leather

* Mythic Dawn Robes
 with hood: 9 Leather Strips, 6 Leather
 without hood: 3 Leather Strips, 4 Leather

* Mythic Dawn Hood
 1 Leather Strips, 2 Leather

* Mythic Dawn Gloves
 2 Leather Strips, 2 Leather

* Mythic Dawn Boots
 2 Leather Strips, 1 Leather

* Greybeard Robes
 with hood: 9 Leather Strips, 6 Leather
 without hood: 3 Leather Strips, 4 Leather

* Greybeard Hood
 1 Leather Strips, 2 Leather

* Greybeard Boots
 2 Leather Strips, 1 Leather

* Nocturnal Robes
 with hood: 9 Leather Strips, 6 Leather
 without hood: 3 Leather Strips, 4 Leather

* Nocturnal Hood
 1 Leather Strips, 2 Leather

* Novice Robes
 without hood: 3 Leather Strips, 4 Leather

* Novice Hood
 1 Leather Strips, 2 Leather

* Apprentice Robes
 without hood: 3 Leather Strips, 4 Leather

* Apprentice Hood
 1 Leather Strips, 2 Leather

* Adept Robes
 without hood: 3 Leather Strips, 4 Leather

* Adept Hood
 1 Leather Strips, 2 Leather

* Expert Robes
 without hood: 3 Leather Strips, 4 Leather

* Master Robes
 without hood: 3 Leather Strips, 4 Leather

* Embellished Robes
 without hood: 3 Leather Strips, 4 Leather

* Refined Tunic
 without hood: 3 Leather Strips, 4 Leather
 
* Vaermina Robes
 without hood: 3 Leather Strips, 4 Leather

INSTALLATION
============
1. Put ESP file(s) under your Skyrim/Data folder.
2. Click \"Data Files\" from the Skyrim launcher and check the ESP(s) in the list.
3. Play the game.

UNINSTALLATION
==============
Remove ESP files from your Skyrim/Data folder or uncheck the ESP(s) in the data files list from the launcher.

KNOWN ISSUES
============
* Some hoods that do not exist as a separate item in the vanilla game have the appearance of a Novice Hood in the inventory and on the ground.  They still show correctly on your character though.

CHANGE LOG
==========
12/04/2011 2.1
* Fixed Focusing Gloves not having selectable enchantments.

12/01/2011 2.0
* Added Mythic Dawn Robes, Mythic Dawn Robes (Hood), Mythic Dawn Hood, Mythic Dawn Gloves, Mythic Dawn Boots.
* Added Greybeard Robes, Greybeard Robes (Hood), Greybeard Hood, Greybeard Boots.
* Added Nocturnal Robes, Nocturnal Robes (Hood), Nocturnal Hood.
* Added Novice Robes, Novice Hood.
* Added Apprentice Robes, Apprentice Hood.
* Added Adept Robes, Adept Hood.
* Added Expert Robes.
* Added Master Robes.
* Added Focusing Gloves.
* Added Embellished Robes.
* Added Refined Tunic.
* Added Vaermina Robes.
* Split enchanted and unenchanted recipes into two different ESPs.

11/29/2011 1.0 
Initial release.
author: kab
